mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logs ( request_url, request_method, response_status, client_ip, request_time, response_time, service_name ) VALUES ( #{requestUrl}, #{requestMethod}, #{responseStatus}, #{clientIp}, #{requestTime}, #{responseTime}, #{serviceName} )
mapper.select: SELECT log_id AS logId, request_url AS requestUrl, request_method AS requestMethod, response_status AS responseStatus, client_ip AS clientIp, request_time AS requestTime, response_time AS responseTime, service_name AS serviceName FROM logs WHERE log_id = #{logId}

SELECT log_id AS logId, request_url AS requestUrl, request_method AS requestMethod, response_status AS responseStatus, client_ip AS clientIp, request_time AS requestTime, response_time AS responseTime, service_name AS serviceName FROM logs ORDER BY request_time DESC
